I doubt he will though, because he’s a stupid ass fucker.

dude, dont get cocky bitch.

they do the same thing, doesnt matter if they can/cant do the command again since all it will do is add more xp to the skills it gives xp to. doesnt change anything.[/quote][quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:150755”][quote author=jeddac link=topic=206349.msg3009928#msg3009928 date=1256690168]

why wud go really go back to page 5000+ and reply to a thread, stupid moron.[/quote][quote=“xxlukexx, post:19, topic:311098”][quote author=s3x 4 u l1f3 link=topic=407551.msg3010196#msg3010196 date=1256711027]

if you dont know where to add a simple case, then you got serious problems.[/quote][quote=“xxlukexx, post:6, topic:311177”]stfu and gtfo outa here.[/quote]

item.title: Why is this happening?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:3, topic:311177”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=407621.msg3010401#msg3010401 date=1256735525]

[code=java] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“npcreset”) && playerRights >= 1){
for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) {
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2627 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2630 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2631 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2741 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2743 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2746 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2738 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3777 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3778 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3779 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3780){
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = false;
} else
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0;
}}

	yell("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName);
}[/code]

just try this, im not lookin thru it all since they may be a little error.
[/quote]No, changing > to >= won’t fix the problem.[/quote]

funny kid? i never actually changed it so smd.

item.title: Why is this happening?
item.dc:creator: @R4nger_0wnz R4nger 0wnz
item.description:
@R4nger_0wnz wrote:

Im copyed a ::npcreset code in my client i compiled no errors logged into server dose ::npcreset an i got some wired thing in the run at the bottom.

My ::npcreset Code

[CODE] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“npcreset”) && playerRights > 1){
for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) {
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2627 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2630 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2631 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2741 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2743 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2746 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2738 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3777 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3778 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3779 || server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 3780){
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = false;
} else
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0;
}}

	yell("System Message - Server npc reset by " + playerName);
}[/CODE]

When i do ::npc reset i get this.

Im So Famous has started succesfully. A player has connected 123: command: npcreset java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException
